attributes.additional_details: LIGHT THE TREE THE BEST IN THE UK.
attributes.background:
THE CHRISTMAS TREE IN OUR CAPITAL IS A DISGRACE.
THE GOOD PEOPLE OF NORWAY GIVE US THIS TREE AND THE LIGHTING IS DISGRACEFUL , BRINGS SHAME ON US ALL.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

You may want to start a petition to the London Assembly, or write to the Mayor of London.

You can find more information about creating a petition to the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/petitions
